noFormValuesError.title: Oop! Hang on there!
noFormValuesError.description: Form inputs cannot be empty. Please enter the values before you hit submit.

noTitleError.title: Name it!
noTitleError.description: Expense Title cannot be empty. Give a title before you submit your expense details.

noAmountError.title: Don't lie...
noAmountError.description: Expense Amount cannot be empty. Enter the amount you spent before you submit you expense.

noDateError.title: When did this happen?
noDateError.description: Expense Date cannot be empty. Select an approximate date for your expense before you submit you expense.
